resources.string: The allowed max number of incoming interrupts to consider a HOME key press as valid. A lower value allows to have a more aggressive filtering, instead a higher value allows to have a more permissive filtering.

The wait time in ms before reporting the collected HOME key presses. The key presses during this wait time are collected and reported only if the system received a number of interrupts less than or equal to the allowed max number of incoming allowed interrupts.
The number of interrupt checks to be performed for the incoming MENU and BACK key presses. A lower value is more permissive, a higher value securely avoids most of the bad interrupts.
The time in ms to wait after the first error on MENU or BACK keys if there are many invalid key errors in rapid sequence.
The time in ms to wait after the last error on MENU or BACK keys if there are many invalid key errors in rapid sequence.
This application allows to customize the filtering parameters of the Phantom key Presses filter module.
Follow the official app thread on XDA forum.
If you like my work and you\'d like to make a donation.
